data.name: Adrenaline Shot
data.description: A serum that fully restores stamina and temporarily increases stamina regeneration

data.name: Advanced ARC Powercell
data.description: Very valuable resource that drops from certain ARC enemies

data.name: Advanced Electrical Components
data.description: Used to craft utility items and shield mods. Can be recycled into crafting materials. Used to craft: Raider Hatch Key, Photoelectric Cloak

data.name: Advanced Electrical Components Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft an Advanced Electrical Component

data.name: Advanced Mechanical Components
data.description: Mostly used to craft advanced weapons. Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Advanced Mechanical Components Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft an Advanced Mechanical Components

data.name: Agave
data.description: A piece of an agave leaf. Can be used to regain a small amount of health.

data.name: Agave Juice
data.description: A concoction that temporarily increases stamina regeneration, at a small initial cost to health.

data.name: Air Freshener
data.description: May be worth a few coins.

data.name: Alarm Clock
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Angled Grip I
data.description: Slightly reduces horizontal recoil.
data.flavor_text: Compatible with Ferro, Kettle, Rattler, Stitcher, Arpeggio, Il Toro, Venator, Bobcat, Tempest, Vulcano

data.name: Angled Grip II
data.description: Moderately reduces horizontal recoil.
data.flavor_text: Compatible with: Ferro, Kettle, Rattler, Stitcher, Arpeggio, Il Toro, Venator, Bobcat, Tempest, Vulcano

data.name: Angled Grip II Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft an Angled Grip II

data.name: Angled Grip III
data.description: Significantly reduces horizontal recoil.
data.flavor_text: Compatible with: Ferro, Kettle, Rattler, Stitcher, Arpeggio, Il Toro, Venator, Bobcat, Tempest, Vulcano

data.name: Angled Grip III Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft an Angled Grip III

data.name: Antiseptic
data.description: Used to craft medical supplies. Can be recycled into chemicals.

data.name: Anvil Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft an Anvil - Has high damage output and headshot damage, but slow handling.

data.name: Anvil I
data.description: Single-action hand cannon with high damage output and headshot damage, but slow handling.
data.flavor_text: Very effective against ARC armor plating.

data.name: Anvil II
data.description: Single-action hand cannon with high damage output and headshot damage, but slow handling.
data.flavor_text: Very effective against ARC armor plating.

data.name: Anvil III
data.description: Single-action hand cannon with high damage output and headshot damage, but slow handling.
data.flavor_text: Very effective against ARC armor plating

data.name: Anvil IV
data.description: Single-action hand cannon with high damage output and headshot damage, but slow handling.

data.name: Anvil Splitter
data.description: Compatible with: Anvil  - Tech mod for the Anvil that replaces its bullets with ones that split into 4 weaker projectiles.
data.flavor_text: 70% Reduced Projectile Damage & +3 Projectiles Per Shot

data.name: Anvil Splitter Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft an Anvil Splitter

data.name: Aphelion Rifle Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft an Aphelion Rifle

data.name: Apricot
data.description: A sun ripe apricot. Can be consumed for a small amount of stamina.

data.name: ARC Alloy
data.description: Obtained from ARC enemies or activities, or by recycling certain ARC parts. Used to craft components.

data.name: ARC Circuitry
data.description: Obtained from ARC enemies or activities. Used to craft components. Can be recycled into ARC Alloy.

data.name: ARC Circuitry Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft an ARC Circuitry

data.name: ARC Coolant
data.description: Obtained from ARC enemies or activities. Can be recycled into chemicals

data.name: ARC Flex Rubber
data.description: Obtained from ARC enemies or activities. Can be recycled into rubber.

data.name: ARC Motion Core
data.description: Obtained from ARC enemies or activities. Used to craft components. Can be recycled into ARC Alloy.

data.name: ARC Performance Steel
data.description: Obtained from ARC enemies or activities. Can be recycled into scrap metal.

data.name: ARC Powercell
data.description: Valuable resource that drops from all ARC enemies. Used to craft: Shield Recharger

data.name: ARC Synthetic Resin
data.description: Obtained from ARC enemies or activities. Can be recycled into plastic.

data.name: ARC Thermo Lining
data.description: Obtained from ARC enemies and activities. Can be recycled into fabric.

data.name: Arpeggio I
data.description: Has decent damage output and accuracy.
data.flavor_text: Somewhat effective against ARC armor plating

data.name: Arpeggio II
data.description: A 3-round burst assault rifle with decent damage output and accuracy.
data.flavor_text: Somewhat effective against ARC armor plating

data.name: Arpeggio III
data.description: A 3-round burst assault rifle with decent damage output and accuracy.

data.name: Arpeggio IV
data.description: A 3-round burst assault rifle with decent damage output and accuracy.

data.name: Assorted Seeds
data.description: A handful of seeds. Celeste might be looking for these.

data.name: Aviator (Outfit)
data.description: Aviator outfit is a quest reward from Armored Transports.

data.name: Bag (Radio Renegade Variant)
data.description: Radio Renegade Bag Variant - Unlock by completing Power Out Quest.

data.name: Banana (Backpack Charm)
data.description: Banana backpack charm from Medical Merchandise quest.

data.name: Bandage
data.description: A medical item that gradually restores health over time.

data.name: Barricade Kit
data.description: A deployable cover that can block incoming damage until it breaks.

data.name: Barricade Kit Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Barricade Kit

data.name: Bastion Cell
data.description: A salvaged component from a Bastion unit. Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Battery
data.description: Used to craft medical supplies. Can be recycled into scrap metal.

data.name: Bettina Blueprint
data.description: Has slow fire rate and high damage output.
